title: Podcast-Based Instructional Design for Improving Science Career Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A process for pre-service/in-service teachers to design and implement teaching-learning methods using STEM expert interviews to improve science career education

learning_goals: Learners can analyze students' misconceptions about science career paths and present three or more podcast interview design strategies to address them.
Learners can develop science career education modules using interview content with STEM experts and apply them in blended learning environments.
Learners can validate the effectiveness of podcast-based educational materials through project-based assessments.

resources: Science Career Support Materials (Statistics, Case Studies, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
